column4: i have problem with burning dvd, i try to burn some .avi file but i cant... it says media is not formatted or unsupported.
are you trying to burn a video dvd or a data dvd?
brasero should allow it no problem. Are you sure the dvd in the drive is a good one?
i dont know. i use usb Dvd-w
ok....open brasero, choose to create a data dvd. Click Add and add one avi file to the list...then click on burn.
Brasero should open a second window and there make sure you have the usb drive selected
and make sure there is a blank dvd in the drive
it looks like the dvd in the drive is not blank....that is my best guess from that printout..."(cannot write medium - incompatible format)"
i bought 50 blank dvd and try 5 of them :S
I wonder if what you have is a cd read/write but for dvd it is read only
the designations can sometimes mislead....make sure the dvd drive can WRITE dvds as well as cds
ok i ll try it on windows
